# macOS system files
.DS_Store

# IDE/Editor configs
.vscode/
.idea/

# OS generated files
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db
Icon?

# Logs
*.log

# PHP and Apache config files
*.env
.env.local
.env.*.local

# DB credentials and sensitive configs
src/backend/db_config.php

# Node or Composer (if later added)
node_modules/
vendor/

# Backup files
*.bak
*.tmp
*.swp
*.~*
